sentence: pic.twitter.com/eEvFbnKLBY Wendy Nevarez (@WendyforWNC) February 10, 2022 Asheville YMI celebrates 129 years; $5 million renovations to begin in April Citizen Times, Sarah Honoski, 2/11/2022 As the YMI Cultural Center in downtown Asheville celebrates 129 years, it is preparing to move out of its historic building on the corner of Eagle and Market streets, aka on "the Block," if only temporarily, to make way for $5 million of much-needed renovations.
title: DKos Asheville Open Thread: Cawthorn gone wild, Dem forum, Rosa Parks awards, YMI at 129 yrs

sentence: Cawthorn is facing a number of GOP candidates including Edwards, Woodhouse, Bruce O'Connell, Rod Honeycutt, Matthew Burril and Wendy Nevarez.
author: Melanie Zanona, Manu Raju and Alex Rogers
title: 'He's an embarrassment': Republicans threaten to primary Cawthorn over controversial antics
